title: Can't login to the game
body:
After I put my Username and password to login to the game in the Login Status Box said logging on but I can't get in to the game.
I only have this issues when I using my phone internet (Optus) but with my home internet it fine to login and play the game. 

Please help me. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me (While connected to your phone internet) and let me know if that helps.

Hi,

I had try switching to a public DNS while I connected to my phone internet but it still not work at all and i been 7 days already and I still have the problem with that.
Are you with Optus? There have been some issues lately with Optus, you'll have to contact your ISP regarding these.
